mapper.insert: insert into tb_users (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL) values (TB_USERS_SEQ.nextval, #{user.id}, #{user.password}, #{user.name}, #{user.email})
mapper.select: select USER_NO as no , USER_ID as id , USER_PASSWORD as password , USER_NAME as name , USER_EMAIL as email , USER_CREATED_DATE as createdDate , USER_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate from TB_USERS where USER_ID = #{id}

select USER_NO as no , USER_ID as id , USER_PASSWORD as password , USER_NAME as name , USER_EMAIL as email , USER_CREATED_DATE as createdDate , USER_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate from TB_USERS where USER_NO = #{no}
select * from TB_USERS order by USER_NO asc
